Text: tried playing this with 5 different media players but no joy. video is super slow and skips every 10-15 seconds.  :(  Thanks for trying anyway though!

Likely an issue on your end. Probably a low spec computer or improper codecs. File plays beautifully on a good computer. Use LAV codecs and Media Player Classic Home Cinema. If you can't play it still because your computer can't handle it, then just re-encode it yourself using something simple like Format Factory or Total Media Converter and make it 29fps/720p or 480p/lower bitrate.

had problems playing this also and i have a brand new macbook air and western media tv player.... thank you for uploading though :-)

p.s. it does play sporadically, but skips throughout and pixelates often...
It's going to be very rare a laptop, especially a mac, would be able to play 1080p/i, even more so at the current bitrate. Perian Codec Pack + SMPlayer should be fine for Mac.

Most people here complaining that it dont work or skips is bullshit, they need to get rid of their CRAP macbooks and build a REAL desktop pc and it WILL work fine.  It works fine for me with windows media player windows 7 ultimate 64bit.  Get rid of the HIPSTER MAC SHIT!!!!  Thanx for the vid, great quality SecTB.
